titleStmt.title: A treatise upon death first publickly delivered in a funerall sermon, anno Dom. 1630. And since enlarged By N.C. Preacher of Gods word in Scotland at Kilmacolme in the baronie of Renfrew.
titleStmt.author: Campbell, Ninian, 1599-1657.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Y[oung] for I. Wilson, bookseller in Glasgow,

notesStmt.note: Includes severall epitaphs in Latin verse at end.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
